title: Not of This Earth 1957 colorized (Paul Birch)

sources.title: Not of This Earth 1957 colorized (Paul Birch)
sources.description: A strange man from a distant planet, who has come to Earth via a matter transporter, terrorizes Southern California in his experiments to acquire suitable blood to keep his dying race alive. produced & directed by Roger Corman Paul Birch as Paul Johnson, the alien Beverly Garland as Nadine Storey, the nurse Morgan Jones as Harry Sherbourne, the motorcycle cop William Roerick as Dr. F.W. Rochelle Jonathan Haze as Jeremy Perrin, the chauffeur I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
